full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGA' LDAN PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO'I SMON LAM GYI 'GREL PA ZAB LAM SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES YONGS 'DZIN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DKA' CHEN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I DGA' LDAN PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO'I SMON LAM GYI 'GREL PA ZAB LAM SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD BRTZON DANG LDAN PA DGE BSHES BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, CHOS GRVA'I MKHAN MING 'DZIN PA BTZUN GZUGS BSKAL BZANG YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BSKAL BZANG BLO GROS KYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG DGA' LDAN SNYAN BRGYUD KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
